about_the_game:
This DLC contains explicit sexual content! It is only for adults aged 18 or above, and contains content that some players may find offensive, including nudity, sex, workplace inappropriate, pornography, humiliation, multiplayer, werewolves, female domination, violence, etc. Please consider purchasing and adding it!


After adding this DLC, the pictures in the album are changed to adult CG. The subject matter, content, and form of this work are all virtual creations. Any similarity is purely coincidental. The fictional pornographic content in the content is for leisure and entertainment purposes only. Please do not imitate!
All characters in the game are over 18 years old. You must be over 18 years old to enter the game

Game Background

This story takes place on a fantasy continent where various races live.
Humans, werewolves, vampires, succubi... They are not willing to live in peace in a corner, so the war started, the smoke was filled, and the flames of the power struggle burned on the earth.
In the end, the vampire king won, but he lived a life of debauchery and revelry while sitting on the throne.
The seeds of crisis quietly sprouted, and this continent was about to face an unprecedented disaster.
But perhaps, this would be an opportunity to reshuffle the cards between races; perhaps, the continent would enter a new era.
And what did the people on this continent do and what price did they pay for this struggle for power and honor?
The outcome is uncertain, and everything is uncertain.

content_descriptors.notes:
This work may contain nudity, sex, violence, coercion, sexual abuse, humiliation, crime, lily and other pornographic content. Please consider before purchasing.
The characters, place names, events, plots, etc. appearing in this work are all fictitious, and all themes, contents, and forms are fictitious creations.
Any resemblance is purely coincidental and the fictional fantasy content contained in the content is for entertainment purposes only.
All characters in this game are 18 years or older.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750

short_description: This is a puzzle game to find the difference. In the game, what you need to do is to compare two exquisite pictures and find all the differences between them.
